Card - Class in model
An object representing a gaming card with a color and a value

cardEffect - Static variable in class model.Game
Determines the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card.
CardEffect - Interface in model
Functional interface which determines the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card.
CardEffectChaos - Interface in model
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card, has to be accordant with the chaos gamemode
CardEffectClassic - Interface in model
Functional interface which determines that, the behavior of Game when it has to activate the effect of a Card, has to be accordant with the classic gamemode

Returns and changes the field turn to the next turn depending on the direction of the turn cycle and the number of skips
